caption:
Cooking with Mila episode 4: Miracle Rice with Chicken…so easy and so good! #recipes #food #cooking 

Ingredients:
Cooking spray
1-1/2 cups uncooked rice basmati preferred
2-1/2 cups chicken broth or stock
1 teaspoon garlic powder
1 teaspoon onion powder
1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
2 tablespoons dried parsley
8 tablespoons unsalted butter
3 tablespoons finely chopped fresh parsley optional, for serving
Juice of one large lemon
 
Directions:
-Set oven to 400°F. Generously spray a glass or ceramic 9x13-inch pan with cooking spray.
-Add uncooked rice, chicken broth, garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, oregano, parsley, directly into the prepared pan. Stir.
-Add the butter pieces evenly across the mixture. Cover tightly with foil.
-Bake covered for 40 minutes. Remove foil and set it aside, squeeze the lemon, stir and then add the chicken nuggets and bake uncovered for 15 more minutes.
-Remove from the oven and enjoy!
